title: Morgana shield should block Vision Reduction
body: Just wondering why this doesn't already work?  For example, graves smoke canister reduces the vision of who is inside of it.  Morgana shield however, doesn't stop this.  Graves vision reduction is a disable.  Her shield blocks disables.  She should be able to just shield away the vision reduction from his smoke canister.

Actually it is.

Disabling your ability to utilize basic tools like vision is a disable.

If it doesn't stop your ability to move, attack, use abilities, or use items, it's not a disable.
It only reduces the range at which you can effectively do so.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZAcVYoBX,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-30T20:42:39.187+0000)

> If it doesn't stop your ability to move, attack, use abilities, or use items

What's your point? it disables your ability to use regular vision.

By definition it is a disable.

It does not DISABLE it, it only HINDERS it.
It's the difference between being blind and being nearsighted/farsighted.

Turning your volume off disables it. Turning it down is not disabling it.
Squinting hinders your vision, it does not disable it.

Need me to continue giving examples to prove the point? I can go on.
